    By suitably expanding the denominator of the integrand, or otherwise, show that, as t→0+t \rightarrow 0_{+}t→0+​,

    f(t)∼∑k=0∞(−1)k1.3…(2k−1)tkf(t) \sim \sum_{k=0}^{\infty}(-1)^{k} 1.3 \ldots(2 k-1) t^{k} f(t)∼k=0∑∞​(−1)k1.3…(2k−1)tk

    and that the error, when the series is stopped after nnn terms, does not exceed the absolute value of the (n+1)(n+1)(n+1) th term of the series.
